movie_desc: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.
Stars: Vijay Sethupathi, Adithya Bhaskar, Trisha Krishnan

movie_desc: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy
